traits.name: Acid Spit
traits.desc: +3 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d10+1) acid damage.

traits.name: Jab
traits.desc: +5 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) bludgeon damage.

traits.name: Vicious Jab
traits.desc: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target that is adjacent to an ally. Hit: 8 (2d6+2) bludegon and if the target is humanoid, it must pass a DC 10 Con or have disadvantage on all check until the start of Caden's next round.

traits.name: Mask of the Wild
traits.desc: You can attempt to hide even when you are only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena.

traits.name: Magical affinity
traits.desc: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put you to sleep.
